bug_report.Sammary: Application crash on clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
bug_report.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user

Steps_to_Reproduce.second: Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User
Steps_to_Reproduce.third: Filled out all the user information fields
Steps_to_Reproduce.fifth: Seen an error page ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error
Steps_to_Reproduce.sixth: See the attached logs for more information
Steps_to_Reproduce.seventh: Also see the attached screenshot of the error page

bug_report.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button you should be prompted to a successful message New User has been created successfully
